alert.note: Alert for Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Tazewell County through 745 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glen Burke, or near Richlands, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Richlands... Tazewell... Cedar Bluff... Raven... Glen Burke... Jewell Ridge... and Amonate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
